NAME: Harish YN
ABOUT:
Preparation of tax related policies relating to indirect taxes are the  primary function. It involves formulating fiscal policy and aligning tax rates in accordance with the Government’s fiscal needs and legal standing. The work involves examining the need to change GST rate structure on the basis of requests received from trade and industry in the service sector. Also, various clarifications are issued on the taxability and valuation of services. Also, TRU has been the integral part of Union Budget Team. 

I am currently in charge of GST rate structure of following services at TRU: -

 Restaurant Service,
 Hotel Accommodation service,
 Banking, Insurance and Financial Services,
 Lottery and Entertainment Services,
 Media and sporting service,
 Commission agent/intermediary service,
 Export of Services,
 Electricity, Gas, Water and Other Distribution services

EDUCATION.Institute Name: R. V. College of Engineering, Bangalore

EXPERIENCE.Location: Lal Bahadur Shastri National Academy of Administration (LBSNAA), Mussoorie
